items.text: Now these were the sons of David, which were born unto him in Hebron; the firstborn Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess:
items.plainText: Now these were the sons of David, which were born unto him in Hebron; the firstborn Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess:

items.text: The third, Absalom the son of Maachah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur: the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith:
items.plainText: The third, Absalom the son of Maachah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur: the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith:

items.text: The fifth, Shephatiah of Abital: the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife.
items.plainText: The fifth, Shephatiah of Abital: the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife.

items.text: These six were born unto him in Hebron; and there he reigned seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years.
items.plainText: These six were born unto him in Hebron; and there he reigned seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years.

items.text: And these were born unto him in Jerusalem; Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bath-shua the daughter of Ammiel:
items.plainText: And these were born unto him in Jerusalem; Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bath-shua the daughter of Ammiel:

items.text: Ibhar also, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,
items.plainText: Ibhar also, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,

items.text: And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
items.plainText: And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,

items.text: And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.
items.plainText: And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.

items.text: These were all the sons of David, beside the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.
items.plainText: These were all the sons of David, beside the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.

items.text: And Solomon's son was Rehoboam, Abia his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,
items.plainText: And Solomon's son was Rehoboam, Abia his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,

items.text: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,
items.plainText: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,

items.text: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,
items.plainText: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,

items.text: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,
items.plainText: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,

items.text: Amon his son, Josiah his son.
items.plainText: Amon his son, Josiah his son.

items.text: And the sons of Josiah were, the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.
items.plainText: And the sons of Josiah were, the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.

items.text: And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.
items.plainText: And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.

items.text: And the sons of Jeconiah; Assir, Salathiel his son,
items.plainText: And the sons of Jeconiah; Assir, Salathiel his son,

items.text: Malchiram also, and Pedaiah, and Shenazar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.
items.plainText: Malchiram also, and Pedaiah, and Shenazar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.

items.text: And the sons of Pedaiah were, Zerubbabel, and Shimei: and the sons of Zerubbabel; Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister:
items.plainText: And the sons of Pedaiah were, Zerubbabel, and Shimei: and the sons of Zerubbabel; Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister:

items.text: And Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushab-hesed, five.
items.plainText: And Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushab-hesed, five.

items.text: And the sons of Hananiah; Pelatiah, and Jesaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.
items.plainText: And the sons of Hananiah; Pelatiah, and Jesaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.

items.text: And the sons of Shechaniah; Shemaiah: and the sons of Shemaiah; Hattush, and Igeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.
items.plainText: And the sons of Shechaniah; Shemaiah: and the sons of Shemaiah; Hattush, and Igeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.

items.text: And the sons of Neariah; Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.
items.plainText: And the sons of Neariah; Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.

items.text: And the sons of Elioenai were, Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Dalaiah, and Anani, seven.
items.plainText: And the sons of Elioenai were, Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Dalaiah, and Anani, seven.
